mapper.update:
update dm_cust_order
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL},
RELA_MAN = #{relaMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELA_TEL = #{relaTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELA_PROVINCE = #{relaProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELA_CITY = #{relaCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELA_DISTRICT = #{relaDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELA_ADDR = #{relaAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_TYPE = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_NOTES = #{invoiceNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_DETAIL = #{invoiceDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORD_NOTES = #{ordNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_DATE = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPER_STAFF_NO = #{operStaffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_NOTES = #{operNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dm_cust_order set ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, RELA_MAN = #{relaMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELA_TEL = #{relaTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELA_PROVINCE = #{relaProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELA_CITY = #{relaCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELA_DISTRICT = #{relaDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELA_ADDR = #{relaAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_TYPE = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_NOTES = #{invoiceNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_DETAIL = #{invoiceDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORD_NOTES = #{ordNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_DATE = #{operDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPER_STAFF_NO = #{operStaffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_NOTES = #{operNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select IFNULL(count(1),0)as bepaid from (select
from dm_cust_order custorder WHERE custorder.merchant_id = #{merchantId} and custorder.state in ('10A','10B','10E')) userBePaid
